heroTitle: 🚀 Let AI write the code – you just bring the idea. 🚀
heroSubtitle:
Tired of being afraid to code?
In this course, you'll learn how to build software, websites, automations and bots – with zero coding!

projects.title: 💡 "One Less Form"
projects.description: An automated bot that fills in forms for you.

projects.title: 🌐 "Five-Minute Website"
projects.description: A smart site generator that creates a webpage at the click of a button.

projects.title: 🤖 "Your Virtual Assistant"
projects.description: A Telegram bot that answers questions and performs tasks on your behalf.

projects.title: 📄 "Effortless Office"
projects.description: A tool that drafts contracts, reports, and documents automatically.

projects.title: 📊 "Excel That Gets You"
projects.description: An intelligent system for data analysis and insights.

projects.title: 🌍 "Super Translator"
projects.description: An advanced translation service that preserves meaning and style.

projects.title: ✍️ "Dream Writer"
projects.description: A generator for stories, scripts, and social media posts.

projects.title: 🗓️ "Meetings, No Headaches"
projects.description: A personal assistant for scheduling your calendar and sending reminders.

contactBody: Seats are limited – don't miss the chance to dive into the AI world without writing a line of code!
